properties.entry: INSERT INTO T_BOARD(T_NO, T_TITLE, T_PRICE, CATEGORY_NO, BOOK_STATUS, CONTENT, MEMBER_NO) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT2(FILE_NO, T_NO, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL,STATUS,CHANGE_NAME) VALUES(SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT B.T_NO, T_TITLE, T_PRICE, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM T_BOARD B JOIN ATTACHMENT2 A ON (B.T_NO = A.T_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM T_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT T_NO,T_TITLE, T_PRICE,CATEGORY_NO, CREATE_DATE, T_COUNT, MEMBER_NO, B.STATUS ,FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM T_BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT2 USING (T_NO) WHERE B.STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ? AND CATEGORY_NO = ?

SELECT T_NO, T_TITLE, CATEGORY_NO, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_NO,T_PRICE,B.STATUS,BOOK_STATUS FROM T_BOARD B LEFT JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE T_NO = ? AND B.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO, FILE_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM ATTACHMENT2 WHERE T_NO = ?
UPDATE T_BOARD SET T_COUNT = T_COUNT + 1 WHERE T_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE T_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE T_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO, FILE_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM ATTACHMENT2 WHERE T_NO = ?
UPDATE T_BOARD SET T_TITLE = ?, T_PRICE = ?, CATEGORY_NO = ?, BOOK_STATUS = ?, CONTENT = ?, MEMBER_NO = ? WHERE T_NO = ?
UPDATE ATTACHMENT2 SET FILE_NAME = ?, FILE_PATH = ?, STATUS = ?, CHANGE_NAME = ? WHERE T_NO = ? AND FILE_LEVEL=?
